title: Growing concentration of ownership of news media

content.question: Which of the following describes a consequence of the growing concentration of ownership of the news media?

choices.label: Coverage of political events has gotten more liberal over time.
Prices for televised campaign ads have gone down.
There is increased similarity of network news coverage.

content.answer: There is increased similarity of network news coverage.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
